titles.title: Take the world, but give me Jesus

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take the world, but give me Jesus, All its joys are but a name; But His love abideth ever, Through eternal years the same.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Oh, the height and depth of mercy! Oh, the length and breadth of love! Oh, the fullness of redemption, Pledge of endless life above!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take the world, but give me Jesus, Sweetest comfort of my soul; With my Savior watching oâ€™er me, I can sing though billows roll.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Take the world, but give me Jesus, Let me view His constant smile; Then throughout my pilgrim journey Light will cheer me all the while.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take the world, but give me Jesus. In His cross my trust shall be, Till, with clearer, brighter vision, Face to face my Lord I see.
